name: Obi-Ibo
description:
Stranded on a strange planet, a dual personality robot, Obi and Ibo, must find their ship and return home.

Traverse through 3 levels riddled with enemies and obstacles, switching personalities to tackle these challenges.

Obi & Ibo was made by a small group of students at CTU FEE Prague and submitted to the Nokia Game Jam 5.

Controls:

BindingNumpad keysKeyboard  keysMove Left4AMove Right6DJump8WCrouch2SSwitch personality9SPACEUse Ability - Punch / Dash7SHIFTInteract5E

Personalities and Enemies:

IBO

Light and fast  - can jump higher and move faster.

Abilities: Dash and Super Jump

OBI

Heavy and slow - can take more damage and destroy objects.

Abilities: Punch and Stomp

LYR 

Fast moving slimy thing.

RYL

Slow tanky turtle creature.
